name: BSO
comment:
>>37693936

“It'll be alright.” You nod, planting a hand on his shoulder. “Let's find something to do with these Identifiers, okay? Then, you can introduce me to the party. Go ahead and organize a meeting, okay?”

“Yeah, okay. What do you want to do, then?” He asks, beginning to navigate menus on his UI. “Bury them, or something?”

“Thinking.”

> Head out to the caves, and find a nice-looking spot to leave them.
> Head to the town square, and investigate the crowd and the Materialization Altar.
> See if you can't sell them, or have them broken down for parts.
> Keep them for now. You'll make concessions for the dead some other time.
